results.text: You mis-appraise the value of an item, either believing it to be the real deal or vastly overestimating its worth. Anyone attempting to buy this item from you must make an Investigation check (DC 10). If they succeed, they refuse to buy anything else from you for the next week.
The mastermind who came up with this code has foiled you. You have disadvantage on any checks made to decipher codes and ciphers for the next hour.
You find an inconsequential object, letter, or some other clue that you believe to be integral to the investigation.
You overhear or otherwise uncover a dubious rumor that you are certain is true. You waste a day pursuing an erroneous lead.
You’ve been searching or researching for hours but to no avail. You gain a level of Strife.
Your sources aren’t lining up and you’re chasing leads that seem to go nowhere. You have disadvantage on your next Investigation check.
